title: Kansas Land, Ownership, Tenure & Sovereignty
description: Statewide land/ownership stack for Kansas, including current parcels and public lands; sovereign/tribal boundaries; conservation & protected areas (PAD-US); PLSS grid; and historical homestead/patent records (GLO/BLM). Intended for time-aware overlays with roads/rail/hydrology.
license: Open/Public as provided by each source (see per-asset). Some parcel layers carry county-level usage terms.

providers.name: U.S. Fish & Wildlife Service / USGS PAD-US

parcels_current.title: Kansas Parcels / Ownership (current, statewide aggregation)
parcels_current.kfm:notes: Statewide parcel aggregation. Attribute harmonization required; county-level usage/licensing may apply.

plss_cadnsdi.title: BLM CadNSDI PLSS (Township/Range/Section, aliquots)
plss_cadnsdi.kfm:notes: Use for geocoding historical legal descriptions and reconciling homestead patents.

glo_patents.title: BLM GLO Records (Patents, Survey Plats/Field Notes)
glo_patents.kfm:notes: Use GLO search/download to retrieve homestead/patent tracts by county/T-R-S; associate to PLSS aliquots.

padus.title: Protected Areas Database of the US (PAD-US, combined)
padus.kfm:filter: Subset to Kansas (GAP status, ManagerType, OwnerType).

tribal_areas.title: TIGER/Line American Indian/Alaska Native/Native Hawaiian Areas (AIANNH)
tribal_areas.kfm:notes: Download KS-relevant AIANNH/Tribal Subdivisions to represent historic/current federal Indian lands.

federal_lands.title: Federal/Public Lands (reference layers as available)
federal_lands.kfm:notes: Use with PAD-US; include USACE, USFWS, NPS units within Kansas where applicable.

metadata.title: Processing & lineage metadata for land/ownership stack

processing.notes: Normalize parcels/PAD-US/tribal/federal layers into this schema; maintain PLSS references for historical tracts (GLO patents). Treat county parcel APN/owner names per local terms; consider hashing/anonymizing names for public display when required.
